column2: Vermilion Energy, Inc. engages in the business of acquisition, exploration, development, and production of oil and natural gas. The company is headquartered in Calgary, Alberta and currently employs 698 full-time employees. Its primarily interested in light oil and liquids-rich natural gas. The firm manages the acquisition, exploration, development and optimization of producing properties in North America (Canada and USA), Europe (France, Holland, Germany, Ireland, Croatia, Hungary, Slovakia) and Australia.
